select sys_user.id as user_id, sys_user.username, sys_user.nick_name, sys_user.avatar, sys_user.email, sys_user.mobile, sys_user.`status`, sys_user.create_by, sys_user.create_time, sys_user.last_update_by, sys_user.last_update_time from sys_user where sys_user.deleted = 0
and sys_user.username like concat('%', #{condition.username}, '%')
order by sys_user.create_time desc
